values: I want everyone who reads this to ask me 3 questions, no more no less. Ask me anything you want. Then I want you to go to your journal, copy and paste this allowing your friends (including myself) to ask you anything. i'm not demanding but do so and ask if you have anything you'd like to know. this can be interesting.
leave something true, but negative about me.

Post anything that you want, and post it anonymously. Anything. A story, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love - anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice if you'd like. Then, put this in your LJ to see what your friends (and perhaps others who you don't even realize read your LJ) have to say. please do, i'd really like to know what people think of me honestly. one reason why i would want to read minds. so i know how people really think. but since i dont have this superpower...post me something.

ummm for everyone who doesn't have a lj and reads this regularly, you wont be able to read it anymore since i'm making them all friends only. but if you ask me for the password for huelessnitez, i might give it to you since that username is on my friends list. i made the username huelessnitez cause i only have black and white dreams.
